message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product and I believe it would be valuable to you. I'm offering it to you for $12,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I am only able to pay up to $9,500 for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I understand your position, but the product is quite valuable. Could you meet me halfway at $10,750?
Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm still not able to meet you at $10,750. My maximum budget remains at $9,500. I hope we can find a middle ground.
